title: New Game Mode 3v3v3
body:
3v3v3 game mode on a customized Dominion map- Capture points removed. Team 1 and 3 are where red/blue team base is normally, team 2 is at the top of the map making it an equal 3way split. I've made a very simple and dodgy customization of the dominion map with my pro MS Paint skills. I'm sure it will serve its purpose in explaining what the map would be like.

Capture points removed- Nexus added to each team instead
XP/Gold gained over time similar to howling abyss and dominion
Start at level 3 with 1375g
4 towers per team- 2 either side of base exits
HP Points and Speed Points still in default areas
Middle buff would be changed from blue/red buff to a single buff that grants that team map vision for X minutes

Having a buff that grants a team entire map vision (not including brush) would make for a great battle hotspot as it would be heavily contested. If the buff became available early on (2-5min game time) it would create a faster-paced high action game, especially having a 3rd team to fight against. Do you work with another team to shut down a hard carry and wipe someone out or play heavy defense and fight the remaining scraps?

replies.body: this could be problematic. cause some people might be too clever and have two of the teams team up to destroy the other one making it a not very fun time for them.
I tried to do this back when the forums existed. It really didn't catch on, and I can't find the link.
